DOC.brief_summary: This investigational multi-site outcome registry intend collect information patient 's cancer care . Patients may enter Registry time patient 's current stage continuum care . The registry main objective measure evaluate effect patient care throughout care continuum , result identification effective treatment option . Objectives encompass evaluation analytics around safety , effectiveness , improved efficiency .
